message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled benefits and capabilities that are sure to exceed your expectations. Considering its exceptional quality and features, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $500000. We believe this is a fair and attractive offer that provides you with an opportunity to experience the superior performance of our product at a competitive cost. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of your product, $500000 is significantly below what I'm prepared to pay at this time. I'm willing to offer $1000000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value and the potential benefits it offers. Let me know your thoughts on this counteroffer.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and would like to propose a compromise. Considering the value and benefits of our product, along with your willingness to negotiate, we are willing to consider an offer of $750000. This price reflects a balance between the product's value and your budget. We hope this offer is acceptable to you, and we look forward to your response.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While $750000 is closer to my budget, I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875000.  This is a fair price that acknowledges the value of your product while staying within my budget.  Let me know if this offer works for you.
